rules.text: We welcome everyone active in the OpenJDK, Java, JavaFX, JVM, and related communities.
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other users.
No impersonation of other people, companies, organizations, brands, etc.

No incitement of violence or advocacy of violent acts/ideologies.
No sexually explicit or violent media.
No intentionally false or misleading information.
No advertising, spam or excessive promotion.
Please do not upload (long) videos here, but use a dedicated service for this goal (Vimeo, PeerTube,...) and post a link in your message.
